[
    { "advice": "Consider setting a specific goal for your daily piano practice, such as dedicating 45 minutes of your day to it. This can help you stay focused and motivated.", "category": "Goal Setting" },
    { "advice": "Try to schedule your workout routine to a consistent time, for example 8 or 9 in the morning, so it becomes a habit and you can make the most out of your gym sessions.", "category": "Workout Routine" }, 
    { "advice": "Make a conscious effort to stretch after your workout to help prevent muscle soreness. This can also help improve your overall flexibility.", "category": "Fitness" },
    { "advice": "Plan your meals in advance to ensure that you can eat a healthy dinner every day. This can help you save time and money, and also ensure that you're getting the nutrients your body needs.", "category": "Nutrition" },
    { "advice": "Use the reflection section in your journal to identify what causes you to deviate from your plans, and try to come up with strategies to overcome those obstacles.", "category": "Personal Growth" }
